info.name: Book Store Management
info.description:
Implement backend APIs for “Book Store Management ” System using Node JS  
technology ( Feathers JS).

The System implement APIs with the following features.

1. Login / Register
2. For managing book categories, users can view category lists , add new  
    categories and remove categories.
3. For managing books, search books by book name, author and category name.  
    And also, add a new book, update the book and remove the book.
4. For managing selling books, users can add selling books with corresponding data  
    (book name, customer name, quantity and discount). Total amount shows the  
    total cost of the books and next you have to enter how much money to pay.For managing sale records, users can see and manage sales records with sell id,  
    customer name, amount, paid and due.Calculate the total amount and total  
    paid.
5. For managing customer records, users can view and manage customers. Update  
    and Remove customer data also.
